channel.title: elise on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in elise on Barefoot Rob

item.title: the Other step sister
item.description: 01:01 Sunday 24 January 2016 PST Today we all went to a pizza party including several members of the family, then Fred and I took Lin to meet our step sister Elise (not her real name). We played with the kids outside on the trampoline, played with the dogs inside the house, and went out for ice cream (Lin got Cake Batter flavor), some coffee (at a chain), and some yummy drinks (at a big retailer).
